title: How well do you think fictional Hausa mythology will do in today's fantasy book market? I am talking about Before the Origin by F.S. Bala. - Quora

response.answer_text: Hausa fictional mythology will do pretty good today for the following reasons i believe. Hausa stories to begin with always have a true story background or a copy of it. Example, the story of Queen Ameena. It was almost always told as folklore until it was discovered to be true,only that some things were added.Mythology of Hausa fictions are almost practical experiences.
